bibl.title: Kerkeosiris and its Greeks in the Second Century.
bibl.note: Version originale: Kerkéosiris et ses Grecs au IIe siècle avant notre ère, Actes du XVe Congrès International de Papyrologie. IV (Bruxelles, 1979) pp. 87-94.
BINGEN Jean, Kerkeosiris and its Greeks in the Second Century.
Jean BINGEN, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL (Edinburgh, 2007) pp. 122-131, 2 figg.
